item.title: One Token vs. Many Token
item.description: Both One Token and Many Token are under development and will be released soon! Stay tuned!

item.title: The Function of Supply: An ERC-20 Experiment in Minimum Transactable Value
item.description: An Experiment in the Supply of ERC-20 Tokens This is still a work in progress Abstract This “greypaper” serves to identify a little discussed issue. Popular tokens like Ethereum and Bitcoin, as they gain popularity, inch closer to a divisibility bomb in what I’ve dubbed “the Satoshi problem.” High market cap coins with limited supply and fixed divisibility will eventually experience a slowdown in the network when users are unable to micro-transact.

item.title: Past Project Spotlight #1: Flying Blind, a heart-beat sensing game
item.description: Code Design The purpose of this prototype was to incorporate controls that extended beyond the traditional human-computer interaction in game design. To achieve this, I chose to use off-the-shelf hardware to track a user’s heartbeat, which in turn controls the ship they are on. Software The game polls the heart rate monitor at a rate of 3 hz. At game start, I “calibrate” the sensor by taking the heart rate and computing a moving average across a range of 30 seconds.
